name: Prototype Quick
description:
The AI has dominated the world, everything is caos. The last human survivors created PQ, the only one that is friendly with humans. His mission is to destroy the AI factoroies.

Select between 3 game modes:

  • Objectives: solve them all to stop the favtory.
  • Hordes: destroy all the remaining AI.
  • Parkour: try to scape from the infinite warehouse.

University project.

Made just by me in 3 months, experimental.

Please, if you find bugs, report them in the comments.

Go to options bindings to know them.

If you are using AVG antivirus, add an exception, it detects all unity builds as positive

Feel free to comment your opinions, I'll try to fix and balance everything.
